restaurant.name: Beacon Harbor Bistro
restaurant.tagline: Coastal comfort in the heart of Boston
restaurant.description: Beacon Harbor Bistro brings modern New England cuisine to Back Bay with fresh seafood, farm-driven plates, and a warm, candlelit dining room.

hero.title: Elevated seafood + relaxed Boston charm
hero.subtitle: From butter-poached lobster to wood-fired seasonal plates, Beacon Harbor Bistro curates a dining experience inspired by the harbor and the creative energy of Back Bay.

about.description: Executive Chef Lina Park partners with regional farms, fishers, and cheesemakers to celebrate the flavors of New England. Our dining room blends coastal textures with modern Boston energy for an elevated yet approachable experience.

menu.description: Seasonal highlights with seafood, house-made pastas, and wood-fired mains. Full menu available on request.
